```{r echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(rtweet)
library(here)
token <- readRDS(here("/twitter_token.rds"))
```

```{r cache=TRUE}
tmls <- get_timeline(user = "realDonaldTrump", n=3200, token = token)
opponent <- get_timeline(user = "JoeBiden", n=3200, token = token)

data <- bind_rows(trump, opponent) %>% 
  filter(is_retweet == FALSE) %>% 
  select(screen_name, created_at, text, is_quote, favorite_count, hashtags) 

my_stop_words <- c("donald", "trump", "trump's", "joe", "biden", "bidens", "president", "become", "left", "right", "democrats", "republicans")
```
